title: Emi jEsithE
sahitya:
Emi jEsitE nEmi shrI rAma svAmi karuNa lEni vArilalO



anupallavi



kAma mOha dAsulai shrI rAmuni kaTTu teliyani vArilalO



caraNam 1



immu kaligitE nEmi illAliki sommu beTTite Emi kamma

     viltu kElini delisi Emi tammi kantiv ni karuNalEni vArilalO



caraNam 2



savamu jEsitE nEmi kalimini putrOtsavamu galigitE nEmi

bhuvilOnanya

     bIja janituni goni Emi shivakara shrI rAmuni dayalEni

vArilalO



caraNam 3



meDagaTTitE nEmi anduna lAndaru jODu gaTTitE nEmi cEDiyalanu

     meppinca delisitE nEmi IDulEni rAmuni dayalEni vArilalO



caraNam 4



rAjyamElitE nEmi bahujanulalO pUjyulaitE nEmi Ajya

pravAhamutO

     nannamiDitE nEmi pUjyuDaina rAmuni dayalEni vArilalO



caraNam 5



guruvu tAnaitE nEmi kaNTiki mEnu guruvai tOcitE nEmi vara

     mantramanyula-kupadEshincatE nEmi vara tyAgarAja nutuni

dayalEni vArilalO
